title: Brian Scotto (HOONIGAN)
description:
Brian Scotto is the Chief Creative Officer of HOONIGAN. We talk to him about the new Gymkhana video (that 150MPH jump!), his project cars, carcaine addiction, Hoonicorn versus the world, and teddy bear wheels.
